author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n scendono a 673,733 mld, prestiti marginali a 20 mln
text: FRANKFURT, 28 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 20 25 Use of overnight deposit facility 673,733 681,594 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click .
